long_description: With an outside-accessible blade, the Leatherman Freestyle offers the convenience of a traditional pocket knife with the versatility of a multi-tool. 420HC stainless-steel knife blade opens easily with 1 hand and locks into the open position; blade features a partially serrated edge. DLC coating and carbon fiber inserts on stainless-steel handles provide added resistance against scratches and corrosion. Powerful jaws, outside-accessible blade and removable pocket clip allow you to use the adaptable Leatherman Freestyle like a pocket knife or a multi-tool. Stainless-steel body is extremely tough and corrosion-resistant. Tools include clip point knife blade, needlenose pliers, regular pliers, wire cutters and hard-wire cutters. Assembled in the USA with domestic and imported parts.
short_description: With an outside-accessible blade, the Leatherman Freestyle offers the convenience of a traditional pocket knife with the versatility of a multi-tool.
